page.title: 06Stowford House and Farm cont
page.content: The bull is of the Charolais breed and weighs 900kg.This breed is used as their calves grow faster. There is also a trout pond which was once a mill pond for a water_wheel which is still there.In the{Summer 85 they are allowed to rent out 6 {caravans}to get more money for the house and farm.In the way of machinery there is a dung spreader, a fertilizer spreader, a grass cutter, an owned small tractor and a large rented tractor.No crops can be grown to sell because the soil is too{rocky}and {hard.
